summary: The 2020 Census includes many operations that must be successfully carried out on schedule for a cost-effective headcount of the country’s population. We found that the Census Bureau is generally on track to meet key deadlines. For instance, it was ahead of schedule in its address canvassing field work (which helps ensure a complete and accurate list of addresses). However, the agency plans to make...
title: 2020 Census: Status Update on Early Operations
